name: OR_LOG_POSTNTXT
description: The OR_LOG_POSTNTXT table contains OR management system log postop notes.

columns.name: LOG_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the log record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The number of the line of the post-op notes information for the log.

columns.name: POSTOP_NOTES
columns.description: The post-op notes attached to the log.
